dataAnalysis

Class Observation

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataAnalysis.AbstractObservation
      • dataAnalysis.Observation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Statistics

    public class Observation
extends AbstractObservation
    A single observation of weather data. Stores the data, the sample station ID, and whether the data is a valid sample (using AbstractObservation). It inherits form AbstractObservation
    Version:
    2018-10-02
    Author:
    Robert Hill

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String stid
      The stid of the Observation (a four letter code expressing the sample station location).
      private double value
      The value of the Observation in either degrees C or in W/m^2.

      • Fields inherited from class dataAnalysis.AbstractObservation

        valid

    • Field Detail

      • value

        private double value
        The value of the Observation in either degrees C or in W/m^2.

      • stid

    • Constructor Detail

      • Observation

        public Observation(double value,
                   java.lang.String stid)
        Constructor for Observation. Takes in information on the observation as arguments and stores them in the value and stid instance variables. It also checks to see whether the value supplied as an argument is valid and saves that as true or false.
        Parameters:
        value - a double of the value of the given Observation (either Temperature or Radiation)
        stid - a String of the stid of the given Observation (showing the location of the Observation)

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString Override. Returns the Value and stid of the given Observation
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String Value and the stid of the Observation object in the format "Value at Stid"
